author_title: Product & Business | Tech Entrepreneur | AI Enthusiast | Fashiontech | Fintech
post_text:
(Applications closed) I am hiring for a Product Intern at Ground0

If you are interested in starting your career or pivoting in Product Management with a solid base, working directly with the founders and working on an interesting roadmap, here is the chance :)

1. Comment Interested
2. DM me with your earliest joining date & why you should be hired.
3. I will go through your profile and reply.

Perks: Stipend, Hybrid/remote, Full-time role after internship
